subtitle: Less buttery and sweet than traditional shortbread.

method.text: Mix the flour and rice flour or ground rice together. Add half the sugar. Rub in the butter until the mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs.
Add the rest of the sugar. Add the egg yolk and enough milk or cream to make a firm dough. Knead until smooth then form into a large round.
Place on a piece of baking parchment on a baking tray. Prick with a fine skewer and bake for 40-50 min.
Remove from the oven. Leave to cool on the baking tray for about 10 min. Then carefully lift onto a wire cooling rack. Allow to cool completely.
Dust with sugar before serving. Store in an airtight tin.

title: Round Ayrshire shortbread
